alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 9:58PM CST until November 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW EXPECTED IN FAR NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL WISCONSIN... .Lake effect snow showers will bring significant accumulations to much of far northeast and east central Wisconsin tonight into early Wednesday. The heaviest snows will occur in southern Marinette and southern Oconto counties tonight. Motorists should anticipate hazardous travel conditions, with reduced visibility and snow covered roads. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Snow will be mixed with rain at times near the Lake Michigan shoreline, so accumulations will be lower there. * WHERE...Door County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Poor visibility and slippery road conditions will result in hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
